Notes.optionNotes:
Random Engine Model XYZ 2.0l Engine in-line 4 cylinders.

Engine power (rated) at 2200 rpm: 150 kW (201 hp / 204 PS)

Engine power (max) at 2100 rpm: 170 kW (228 hp / 231 PS)
Random Cutterhead Model ABC\n500 mm width, 600 mm diameter
Random Sensor and HarvestLab Sensor Factory installed, I decal.\nRequires HarvestLab 4000, code 1234\nDisplay mounting rail, code 5678 can be ordered in addition, to install a second display.

Required when pick-up is equipped with an auxiliary drive (2nd hydraulic drive for the pick-up reel)\n\t\tDUAL HEADER DRIVE MUST BE ORDERED ALSO WITH THE PICK-UP! This option is also mandatory for vertical saw drives installed on a Random ProfiCut (for random seeds)
